project_experiences.name: AI-Powered Surface Rescue System for Fasty Life-Sa
project_experiences.description: I developed an AI-powered surface rescue system for Fasty, an autonomous rescue drone, using computer vision algorithms to detect and track humans and objects on the water's surface.

project_experiences.name: AIVA Meeting Speech Recognition System
